alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:47AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wheeler County through 515 AM CDT... At 447 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Elgin to Ericson. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Ericson, Buffalo Flats, Cumminsville, Four Corners and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
